class.name: AspNetMembershipProvider
class.documentation:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Project: DotNetNuke Namespace: DotNetNuke.Provider.AspNetProvider Class: AspNetMembershipProvider -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
The AspNetMembershipProvider overrides the default MembershipProvider to provide an AspNet Membership Component (MemberRole) implementation
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

method.name: AutoUnlockUser
method.declaration: private static bool AutoUnlockUser(MembershipUser aspNetUser)

method.name: ChangePassword
method.declaration: public override bool ChangePassword(UserInfo user, string oldPassword, string newPassword)
method.documentation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
ChangePassword attempts to change the users password
The user to update. The old password. The new password. A Boolean indicating success or failure. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

method.name: ChangePasswordQuestionAndAnswer
method.declaration: public override bool ChangePasswordQuestionAndAnswer(UserInfo user, string password, string passwordQuestion, string passwordAnswer)
method.documentation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
ChangePasswordQuestionAndAnswer attempts to change the users password Question and PasswordAnswer
The user to update. The password. The new password question. The new password answer. A Boolean indicating success or failure. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

method.name: GetUsers
method.declaration: public override ArrayList GetUsers(int portalId, int pageIndex, int pageSize, ref int totalRecords)
method.documentation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetUsers gets all the users of the portal
If all records are required, (ie no paging) set pageSize = -1 The Id of the Portal The page of records to return. The size of the page The total no of records that satisfy the criteria. An ArrayList of UserInfo objects. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

method.name: GetUsers
method.declaration: public override ArrayList GetUsers(int portalId, int pageIndex, int pageSize, ref int totalRecords, bool includeDeleted, bool superUsersOnly)
method.documentation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetUsers gets all the users of the portal
If all records are required, (ie no paging) set pageSize = -1 The Id of the Portal The page of records to return. The size of the page The total no of records that satisfy the criteria. Include deleted users. Only select super users. An ArrayList of UserInfo objects. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

method.name: GetUsers
method.deprecation: Deprecated in 5.1 as Ishydrated is no longer supported
method.declaration: public override ArrayList GetUsers(int portalId, bool isHydrated, int pageIndex, int pageSize, ref int totalRecords)

method.name: GetUsersByEmail
method.declaration: public override ArrayList GetUsersByEmail(int portalId, string emailToMatch, int pageIndex, int pageSize, ref int totalRecords)
method.documentation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetUsersByEmail gets all the users of the portal whose email matches a provided filter expression
If all records are required, (ie no paging) set pageSize = -1 The Id of the Portal The email address to use to find a match. The page of records to return. The size of the page The total no of records that satisfy the criteria. An ArrayList of UserInfo objects. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

method.name: GetUsersByEmail
method.declaration: public override ArrayList GetUsersByEmail(int portalId, string emailToMatch, int pageIndex, int pageSize, ref int totalRecords, bool includeDeleted, bool superUsersOnly)
method.documentation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetUsersByEmail gets all the users of the portal whose email matches a provided filter expression
If all records are required, (ie no paging) set pageSize = -1 The Id of the Portal The email address to use to find a match. The page of records to return. The size of the page The total no of records that satisfy the criteria. Include deleted users. Only select super users. An ArrayList of UserInfo objects. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

method.name: GetUsersByProfileProperty
method.declaration: public override ArrayList GetUsersByProfileProperty(int portalId, string propertyName, string propertyValue, int pageIndex, int pageSize, ref int totalRecords)
method.documentation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetUsersByProfileProperty gets all the users of the portal whose profile matches the profile property pased as a parameter
The Id of the Portal The name of the property being matched. The value of the property being matched. The page of records to return. The size of the page The total no of records that satisfy the criteria. An ArrayList of UserInfo objects. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

method.name: UserLogin
method.declaration: public override UserInfo UserLogin(int portalId, string username, string password, string verificationCode, ref UserLoginStatus loginStatus)
method.documentation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
UserLogin attempts to log the user in, and returns the User if successful
The Id of the Portal the user belongs to The user name of the User attempting to log in The password of the User attempting to log in The verification code of the User attempting to log in An enumerated value indicating the login status. The User as a UserInfo object -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

method.name: UserLogin
method.declaration: public override UserInfo UserLogin(int portalId, string username, string password, string authType, string verificationCode, ref UserLoginStatus loginStatus)
method.documentation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
UserLogin attempts to log the user in, and returns the User if successful
The Id of the Portal the user belongs to The user name of the User attempting to log in The password of the User attempting to log in (may not be used by all Auth types) The type of Authentication Used The verification code of the User attempting to log in An enumerated value indicating the login status. The User as a UserInfo object -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
